thread.title: RICHARD K. ENG, ESQ.
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by RICHARD K. ENG, ESQ.

author: RICHARD K. ENG, ESQ.
title: RICHARD K. ENG, ESQ.
text: I HAVE WORKED WITH MS KAHLER THE PAST SIX MONTHS. [BEFORE HER, I HAVE HAD BLUMBERG PROVIDE LEGAL DOCUMENTS FOR OVER 29 YEARS.] HOWEVER, SHE HAS NEVER CEASED TO AMAZE ME WITH HER DILIGENCE AND ATTENTION TO DETAIL AND INSTRUCTIONS. KUDOS TO DEE!
